title: Teen saves mom from ex-boyfriend following early morning break-in
content:
The woman, who asked not to be identified, woke up to someone standing over her bed. Her estranged boyfriend had broken into her home and doused her in lighter fluid. (KTUL)
TULSA, Okla., (KTUL) -- A woman’s son is being called a hero after fighting off his mom’s estranged boyfriend.
Police are saying the son’s actions may have saved both him and his mom.
The woman, who asked not to be identified, woke up to someone standing over her bed. Her estranged boyfriend had broken into her home and doused her in lighter fluid.
“I woke up and the guy said, 'Keep quiet or I’ll light this lighter and you will burn," the woman said. “He is a dangerous person."
The suspect dragged the woman around the house, threatening to kill her. Then, the woman's son stepped in.
“[They] fought and struggled for a little bit; a shot was fired," said Officer Jeanne MacKenzie.
The bullet just missed the 17-year old son, who received minor injuries from the fight.
“I’m very thankful for my son," the victim said. "My son’s been my protector."
Police say they know the suspect and are actively searching for him. They are also offering extra security to the family.
Meanwhile, this mom is warning other adults to think twice about who they date.
“Be careful who you choose to be partners with," the woman said.
If you know anything about this incident, please call Tulsa police.
